          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A keresztény világkép</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Christian World Concept</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Christliche Weltkonzept</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Concept Chrétien du Monde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Conceito Christian Do Mundo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Concetto Cristiano Del Mondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η χριστιανική παγκόσμια έννοια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Concepto Cristiano Del Mundo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A kereszténység kialakulása és kietljesedése, mint a középkori kultúra alapja</string>
            <string language="en-US">The development of the Christianity and his achievement, than the basis of the mediaeval culture</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">filozófia</string>
            <string language="en-US">philosophy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">középkor</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Entwicklung des Christentums und seiner 
Ausführung, als die Grundlage der mittelalterlichen Kultur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le développement du christianisme et de son 
accomplissement, que la base de la culture médiévale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenvolvimento do christianity e de sua 
realização, do que a base da cultura medieval</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo sviluppo del christianity e del suo successo, 
che la base della coltura medioevale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ανάπτυξη του χριστιανισμού και το επίτευγμά του, 
από τη βάση του μεσαιωνικού πολιτισμού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El desarrollo del cristianismo y de su logro, que
la base de la cultura medieval</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Philosophie</string>
          </keyword>
